name: A King's Gambit
description:
Move your pieces to defeat enemies and collect items. Every 5 coins grant you an ally each with unique abilities and letting them get stronger together. How long can you last?

Your actions occur before the enemies, so remaining in the enemy's attack squares will damage you for that amount of damage.

King - Can heal allies after defeating enemies

Knight - Gets a shield after losing health

Wizard - Charges damage each turn to unleash

Samurai - Gains 1 health after each attack

Known Issues:

Game crashes when moving to the same space as an ally (Spot will be yellow when it should be colorless)
